algebraic_word_problem: If a car travels 300 miles at 60 mph and returns at 75 mph, what is the average speed for the round trip?
step_by_step_solution: Time = distance/speed. Time to go = 300/60 = 5 hours; Time to return = 300/75 = 4 hours. Average speed = Total distance / Total time = 600 / (5 + 4) = 66.67 mph.
